titles.title: Historic Fleet Restoration Act of 1993

To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping by the National Maritime Museum Association not more than 2 vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that are scheduled to be scrapped.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

bill.summary: 3/24/1993--Introduced. Historic Fleet Restoration Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to convey not more than two vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet to the National Maritime Museum Association in San Francisco, California, to be sold for scrap, the proceeds to go for preservation of the historic fleet of the San Francisco Maritime Historical Park.
